title: Analyzing f from graph of f' part - c

content.description: Let f be the function defined for x ≥ 0 with f(0)=5 and f', the first derivative of f, given by f'(x)= e(-x/4)}sin(x2). The graph of y = f'(x) is shown above.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x=2.

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x=2.

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
